alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Lamoille; Washington; Western Addison; Western Chittenden (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 8:05PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lamoille, north central Addison, central Chittenden and northwestern Washington Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 805 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Charlotte, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... South Burlington, Charlotte, Calais, Stowe, Waterbury Village, Williston, Worcester, Bolton, Richmond, Mt. Philo State Park, Underhill, Jericho, Hinesburg, St. George, Huntington, Jericho Village, Waterbury, Underhill State Park, Morristown, and Shelburne. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 62 and 87. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Lamoille; Washington; Western Addison; Western Chittenden
